meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kevin Rowe Marla Goldstein Jacob Silverman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6365.

td.p: Kevin Rowe, a firefighter from Chicago, Illinois
Marla Goldstein, a retired advertising executive originally from Brooklyn, New York
Jacob Silverman, an arts and culture journalist from Brooklyn, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,799)

tr.td: CHINESE GEOGRAPHY
HOW SOON WE FORGET!
ADVERTISING MASCOTS & ICONS
PRESIDENT OF THE YEAR
(Alex: I'll give you the year. You identify the pres.)
POTPOURRI
AT THE "DELI"
